node.title: 'I don't want to cause any more problems': Why Queenslanders are choosing to get their COVID jab now
node.alt: Ethan Martin and Sharon Finnean-White hug and smiel.
node.description: Queensland administers nearly half of Australia's first doses of the COVID-19 vaccine in the last week with many only rolling their sleeves up now. So what's behind the uptick?
node.content:
["Queensland has seen a major surge in the number of people coming out to get their COVID-19 vaccine in the past week.", "Nearly half of all first doses administered across Australia were delivered in Queensland, accounting for nearly 130,000 jabs.", "In the same week, Premier Annastacia Palaszczuk announced unvaccinated Queenslanders would soon be banned from a raft of places, including pubs, clubs, restaurants, cafes, cinemas, sporting events and theme parks.", "Since then, the state has seen a rise in mainly younger Queenslanders turning out to receive the vaccine.", "Data from Queensland Health shows more than 41,000 Queenslanders aged between\u00a020 and\u00a029 years old\u00a0received a first dose of vaccine last week between November 8 and 15, equating to nearly six per cent of\u00a0that age group.", "Meanwhile, more than 17,000 Queenslanders aged 16 to 19 years old\u00a0were vaccinated in the past week\u00a0\u2014 equivalent to nearly seven per cent of\u00a0that age group.", "The biggest jump in numbers has been seen in regional areas, such as Central Queensland, Mackay and the north west of the state.", "So how much difference has the mandate made\u00a0and why have some Queenslanders waited until now to get their vaccination?", "
'I don't want to cause anymore problems'
", "Sharon Finnean-White and Ethan Martin, Townsville", "\"The rest of the family is vaccinated,\" Ms Finnean-White said.", "\"But he [Ethan] is a teenager, there's been a bit of resistance from him. But he has some work coming up so\u00a0it's important for him.\"", "\"I didn't at first see that I needed to get it straight away, but especially with work, they're kind of needing everyone to get it sorted,\" Mr Martin said.", "\"So I don't want to cause any more problems, so I've got it done.\"", "
'I\u00a0felt left out'
", "Jase Holmes, Mount Cotton", "", "
Jase Holmes from Mount Cotton got the COVID-19 vaccine.(ABC News: Alice Pavlovic\u00a0)
", "\"I was the last one in my family to get vaccinated, so I sort of felt left out.", "\"And once it hits 80 per cent vaccinated, they'd be able to go out and I wouldn't. So that 100 per cent influenced me why I got it.\"", "
'It's a necessity'\u00a0
", "Munish Kumar,\u00a0Springwood", "\"It's important for not only me, but for us\u00a0because the government has made it mandatory for our safety.", "\"It's a necessity for me and if more people are vaccinated, our COVID cases will decrease and people will be able to [go] anywhere.\"", "
'I don't want to get COVID'
", "Kahlee Blackman,\u00a0Springwood", "", "
Kahlee Blackman from Springwood, Brisbane\u00a0gets vaccinated.
", "\"I've got two young kids, family from interstate that we want to see and I really just don't want to get COVID and leave my children without a mum.", "
'I'd like to enjoy my life'
", "Josh Lucas, Logan", "\"I work at a theme park so with the Premier's mandates, I won't be able to work unless I get the vaccine.", "\"And I'd like to go out and enjoy life. But I have been meaning to get it, so it's a good extra push.\"", "
'I want to go overseas'
", "Mekar Swisanti,\u00a0Greenbank", "", "
Mekar Swisanti and baby Michael at a COVID vaccine clinic in Greenbank.(ABC News: Alice Pavlovic)
", "\"I'm here mainly to get protected\u00a0and because I have a little baby as well and I want to go overseas.", "\"I want them to meet him. He hasn't seen his grandparents and aunties and uncles, so this means a lot for us.\"", "
'I\u00a0don't want to be selfish'
", "Shannon Connolly,\u00a0Slacks Creek", "\"I didn't want to get it done but I have to for work, to keep getting paid, otherwise I wouldn't have a job.", "\"And it's also for my kids to see their grandparents across the border at Tweed Heads.", "\"So I didn't have much of a choice, but I don't want to be selfish.\"", "
'Do this or don't go anywhere'
", "Lachlan Kennedy,\u00a0Rockhampton", "\"I want to go on holidays and I need it, so I'm sort of being forced to.", "\"So it's do this, or don't go anywhere.", "\"The whole mandatory thing is over the top, forcing people to get it. I wouldn't have got it myself if there wasn't these restrictions.\"", "
'I want our family to do stuff'
", "Lloyd Brandon,\u00a0Townsville", "", "
Lloyd Brandon gets vaccianted in Townsville.(ABC News: Zilla Gordon)
", "\"I've probably rushed it now because we're moving to Victoria at the end of the year, so it was important for us to get it.", "\"Plus, we wouldn't be able to go out if we didn't' have vaccinations and I want our family to do stuff.\"", "
'I\u00a0wanted to keep my job'
", "Leah Doherty,\u00a0Rockhampton", "\"I had to get it for work, I sort of had no choice if I wanted to keep my job,\" she said.", "\"It was a bit difficult, but if I wanted to keep my job, I had to get it.\"", "
'I was waiting to see other options'
", "Patrick Gomes,\u00a0Rockhampton", "", "
Patrick Gomes got the COVID vaccine in Rockhampton.(ABC News: Katrina Beavan)
", "\"I work with a lot of other people, so if I can keep myself safe, I can keep my family safe as well.", "\"But I was just waiting to see what other options we could have, like if there was one that could have all-in-one.", "\"There's now more understanding of what the vaccine can provide to you.\""]
